channel.title: Quietus, a roleplaying game of melancholy horror, now available on DriveThru
channel.description: Quietus, my Forged in the Dark game of melancholy horror is out now on DriveThru after Kickstarting successfully earlier in the year! You can get neck deep in tears and/or blood in the comfort of your own home! HMU if you have any questions or comments, I'd love to hear them! https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/297814/QUIETUS--A-roleplaying-game-of-melancholy-horror
